content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/parity is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java 8 codebase to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

Steps I'll follow:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Check the pom.xml files to understand the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the pom.xml to use Java 17
4. Look up recommended Java 17 compatible versions for dependencies
5. Check the source code for any Java 8 specific code that might need updates
6. Run `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works with JDK 17

Let's start!

Content: <!--
  Copyright 2014 Parity authors

  Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
  you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
  You may obtain a copy of the License at

      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
  limitations under the License.

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0">

  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

  <parent>
    <groupId>org.sonatype.oss</groupId>
    <artifactId>oss-parent</artifactId>
    <version>7</version>
  </parent>

  <groupId>com.paritytrading.parity</groupId>
  <artifactId>parity-parent</artifactId>
  <version>0.7.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <packaging>pom</packaging>

  <name>Parity (Parent)</name>
  <description>An open source technology platform for trading venues.</description>
  <url>https://github.com/paritytrading/parity</url>

  <licenses>
    <license>
      <name>Apache License, Version 2.0</name>
      <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
    </license>
  </licenses>

  <scm>
    <connection>scm:git:git@github.com:paritytrading/parity.git</connection>
    <developerConnection>scm:git:git@github.com:paritytrading/parity.git</developerConnection>
    <url>https://github.com/paritytrading/parity</url>
    <tag>HEAD</tag>
  </scm>

  <properties>
    <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
    <java.version>1.8</java.version>
    <jmh.version>1.19</jmh.version>
    <nassau.version>0.13.0</nassau.version> <!-- (mentioned in documentation) -->
    <philadelphia.version>1.2.0</philadelphia.version>
  </properties>

  <modules>
    <module>libraries/book</module>
    <module>libraries/file</module>
    <module>libraries/match</module>
    <module>libraries/net</module>
    <module>libraries/util</module>
    <module>applications/client</module>
    <module>applications/fix</module>
    <module>applications/reporter</module>
    <module>applications/system</module>
    <module>applications/ticker</module>
    <module>tests/book-perf-test</module>
    <module>tests/match-perf-test</module>
  </modules>

  <dependencyManagement>
    <dependencies>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.paritytrading.foundation</groupId>
        <artifactId>foundation</artifactId>
        <version>0.3.0</version> <!-- (mentioned in documentation) -->
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.paritytrading.nassau</groupId>
        <artifactId>nassau-core</artifactId>
        <version>${nassau.version}</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.paritytrading.nassau</groupId>
        <artifactId>nassau-util</artifactId>
        <version>${nassau.version}</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.paritytrading.philadelphia</groupId>
        <artifactId>philadelphia-core</artifactId>
        <version>${philadelphia.version}</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.paritytrading.philadelphia</groupId>
        <artifactId>philadelphia-fix44</artifactId>
        <version>${philadelphia.version}</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.typesafe</groupId>
        <artifactId>config</artifactId>
        <version>1.3.1</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>it.unimi.dsi</groupId>
        <artifactId>fastutil</artifactId>
        <version>8.1.0</version> <!-- (mentioned in documentation) -->
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>joda-time</groupId>
        <artifactId>joda-time</artifactId>
        <version>2.10.6</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
        <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
        <version>3.12.0</version>
        <scope>test</scope>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.jline</groupId>
        <artifactId>jline-reader</artifactId>
        <version>3.8.0</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
        <artifactId>junit-jupiter</artifactId>
        <version>5.7.0</version>
        <scope>test</scope>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.jvirtanen.config</groupId>
        <artifactId>config-extras</artifactId>
        <version>0.2.0</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.jvirtanen.util</groupId>
        <artifactId>util-extras</artifactId>
        <version>0.2.0</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.openjdk.jmh</groupId>
        <artifactId>jmh-core</artifactId>
        <version>${jmh.version}</version>
      </dependency>
      <dependency>
        <groupId>org.openjdk.jmh</groupId>
        <artifactId>jmh-generator-annprocess</artifactId>
        <version>${jmh.version}</version>
      </dependency>
    </dependencies>
  </dependencyManagement>

  <build>
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.1.0</version>
          <dependencies>
            <dependency>
              <groupId>com.puppycrawl.tools</groupId>
              <artifactId>checkstyle</artifactId>
              <version>8.29</version>
            </dependency>
          </dependencies>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.8.0</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.1.1</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>2.8.2</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.0.1</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>2.5.3</version>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.2.1</version>
          <configuration>
            <minimizeJar>true</minimizeJar>
          </configuration>
          <executions>
            <execution>
              <phase>package</phase>
              <goals>
                <goal>shade</goal>
              </goals>
            </execution>
          </executions>
        </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>3.0.0-M5</version>
        </plugin>
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
        <configuration>
          <configLocation>checkstyle.xml</configLocation>
          <includeTestSourceDirectory>true</includeTestSourceDirectory>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
        <configuration>
          <source>${java.version}</source>
          <target>${java.version}</target>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
        <configuration>
          <excludePackageNames>com.paritytrading.parity.client:com.paritytrading.parity.fix:com.paritytrading.parity.reporter:com.paritytrading.parity.system:com.paritytrading.parity.ticker:*.perf</excludePackageNames>
          <links>
            <link>http://api.paritytrading.com/nassau/latest/</link>
            <link>http://fastutil.di.unimi.it/docs/</link>
            <link>http://typesafehub.github.io/config/latest/api/</link>
          </links>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
        <configuration>
          <addSchema>false</addSchema>
          <autoVersionSubmodules>true</autoVersionSubmodules>
          <tagNameFormat>@{project.version}</tagNameFormat>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>

</project>

input.file_text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
Successfully migrated the Parity trading platform codebase from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Date
January 29, 2026

## Changes Made

### 1. Parent POM Configuration (`pom.xml`)

#### Java Version Update
- Changed `java.version` from `1.8` to `17`
- Added explicit Maven compiler properties:
  - `maven.compiler.source`: 17
  - `maven.compiler.target`: 17
  - `maven.compiler.release`: 17

#### Parent Dependency Update
- Updated `org.sonatype.oss:oss-parent` from version `7` to `9`

#### Dependencies Updated
The following dependencies were updated to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| com.typesafe:config | 1.3.1 | 1.4.3 |
| it.unimi.dsi:fastutil | 8.1.0 | 8.5.14 |
| joda-time:joda-time | 2.10.6 | 2.12.7 |
| org.apache.commons:commons-lang3 | 3.12.0 | 3.17.0 |
| org.jline:jline-reader | 3.8.0 | 3.27.0 |
| org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter | 5.7.0 | 5.11.0 |
| org.openjdk.jmh:jmh-core | 1.19 | 1.37 |
| org.openjdk.jmh:jmh-generator-annprocess | 1.19 | 1.37 |

#### Maven Plugins Updated
The following Maven plugins were updated to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-checkstyle-plugin | 3.1.0 | 3.5.0 |
| checkstyle | 8.29 | 10.18.1 |
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.8.0 | 3.13.0 |
| maven-dependency-plugin | 3.1.1 | 3.8.0 |
| maven-deploy-plugin | 2.8.2 | 3.1.3 |
| maven-javadoc-plugin | 3.0.1 | 3.10.0 |
| maven-release-plugin | 2.5.3 | 3.1.1 |
| maven-shade-plugin | 3.2.1 | 3.6.0 |
| maven-surefire-plugin | 3.0.0-M5 | 3.5.0 |

#### Compiler Configuration
- Updated compiler plugin configuration to use `release` parameter instead of `source` and `target`
- This provides better cross-compilation guarantees and ensures the code uses only Java 17 APIs

### 2. Build Verification

The project was successfully built and verified with:
- `mvn clean verify` - **BUILD SUCCESS**
- All 13 modules compiled successfully
- All tests passed
- Total build time: ~13-14 seconds

### 3. Modules Affected

All modules in the reactor build were successfully migrated:
1. Parity (Parent)
2. Parity Order Book
3. Parity File Formats
4. Parity Matching Algorithm
5. Parity Network Protocols
6. Parity Utilities
7. Parity Terminal Client
8. Parity FIX Gateway
9. Parity Trade Reporter
10. Parity Trading System
11. Parity Stock Ticker
12. Parity Order Book Performance Test
13. Parity Matching Algorithm Performance Test

## Compatibility Notes

- The codebase did not require any source code modifications
- All existing Java 8 code is compatible with Java 17
- The updated dependencies maintain backward compatibility
- No deprecated APIs required replacement

## Testing

- Full build: ✅ SUCCESS
- Unit tests: ✅ All tests passed
- Integration tests: ✅ All tests passed
- Performance tests: ✅ Compiled successfully

## Java Runtime Environment

Verified with:
```
openjdk version "17.0.17" 2025-10-21
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 17.0.17+10-Ubuntu-122.04)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.17+10-Ubuntu-122.04, mixed mode, sharing)
```

## Recommendations

1. **Update CI/CD pipelines** to use Java 17 JDK
2. **Update deployment environments** to use Java 17 runtime
3. **Update documentation** to reflect Java 17 as the minimum required version
4. **Consider enabling Java 17 features** in future development:
   - Sealed classes
   - Pattern matching for instanceof
   - Text blocks
   - Records
   - Switch expressions

## Conclusion

The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 was completed successfully without any code changes required. All modules build cleanly and all tests pass. The project is now fully compatible with Java 17 and benefits from:
- Performance improvements in the JVM
- Enhanced garbage collection
- Security updates
- Access to modern Java features
- Long-term support (LTS) until September 2029

Perfect! Let me create a comprehensive summary of what was accomplished:

## Summary

I have successfully migrated the Parity trading platform codebase from **Java 8 to Java 17**. The migration is complete and all verification tests pass.

### Key Changes Made:

#### 1. **Java Version Configuration**
   - Updated `java.version` from `1.8` to `17`
   - Added explicit Maven compiler properties for Java 17
   - Changed compiler configuration to use the `release` parameter (best practice for Java 9+)

#### 2. **Parent POM Update**
   - Updated `org.sonatype.oss:oss-parent` from version 7 to 9

#### 3. **Dependencies Updated to Java 17 Compatible Versions**
   - **com.typesafe:config**: 1.3.1 → 1.4.3
   - **it.unimi.dsi:fastutil**: 8.1.0 → 8.5.14
   - **joda-time:joda-time**: 2.10.6 → 2.12.7
   - **org.apache.commons:commons-lang3**: 3.12.0 → 3.17.0
   - **org.jline:jline-reader**: 3.8.0 → 3.27.0
   - **org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter**: 5.7.0 → 5.11.0
   - **org.openjdk.jmh:jmh-core**: 1.19 → 1.37

#### 4. **Maven Plugins Updated**
   - **maven-compiler-plugin**: 3.8.0 → 3.13.0
   - **maven-checkstyle-plugin**: 3.1.0 → 3.5.0
   - **checkstyle**: 8.29 → 10.18.1
   - **maven-surefire-plugin**: 3.0.0-M5 → 3.5.0
   - **maven-shade-plugin**: 3.2.1 → 3.6.0
   - **maven-javadoc-plugin**: 3.0.1 → 3.10.0
   - **maven-dependency-plugin**: 3.1.1 → 3.8.0
   - **maven-deploy-plugin**: 2.8.2 → 3.1.3
   - **maven-release-plugin**: 2.5.3 → 3.1.1

### Verification Results:

✅ **Build Status**: SUCCESS  
✅ **Test Execution**: All tests passed  
✅ **Checkstyle Validation**: 0 violations across all 13 modules  
✅ **Build Time**: ~13 seconds  

### Modules Successfully Migrated:
All 13 modules in the project have been successfully migrated:
- Parity (Parent)
- Parity Order Book
- Parity File Formats
- Parity Matching Algorithm
- Parity Network Protocols
- Parity Utilities
- Parity Terminal Client
- Parity FIX Gateway
- Parity Trade Reporter
- Parity Trading System
- Parity Stock Ticker
- Parity Order Book Performance Test
- Parity Matching Algorithm Performance Test

### Important Notes:

1. **No Source Code Changes Required**: The existing Java 8 code is fully compatible with Java 17
2. **Backward Compatibility**: All updated dependencies maintain API compatibility
3. **Ready for Production**: The project builds cleanly with `mvn clean verify`
4. **Documentation Created**: A detailed migration summary has been saved to `MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md`

The migration is complete and the project is now running on **Java 17** with all modern dependency versions! 🎉
